dependencies.description:
bzip2 is a freely available, patent free high-quality data compressor.
It typically compresses files to within 10% to 15% of the best available
techniques (the PPM family of statistical compressors), whilst being
around twice as fast at compression and six times faster at
decompression.
dependencies.name: bzip2

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description: Blosc, an extremely fast, multi-threaded, meta-compressor library
dependencies.name: c-blosc

dependencies.description:
Next generation c-blosc with a new API, a new container and other bells
and whistles
dependencies.name: c-blosc2

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
dependencies.name: hdf5

dependencies.description: Real-time data compression library
dependencies.name: lzo

dependencies.description: Python wrapper for the C-Blosc2 library.
dependencies.name: py-blosc2

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: Fast numerical expression evaluator for NumPy
dependencies.name: py-numexpr

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-packaging

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Get CPU info with pure Python 2 & 3
dependencies.name: py-py-cpuinfo

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.
dependencies.name: py-six

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Runtime is designed to
enhance energy efficiency of applications through active hardware
configuration.
dependent_to.name: geopm-runtime

dependent_to.description:
PaRSEC: the Parallel Runtime Scheduler and Execution Controller PaRSEC
is a runtime and a programming toolbox that support the design and
parallel execution of micro-tasks on distributed, heterogeneous systems.
dependent_to.name: parsec

dependent_to.description: This is the python client for Arkouda.
dependent_to.name: py-arkouda

dependent_to.description:
The carputils framework for running simulations with the openCARP
software.
dependent_to.name: py-carputils

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependent_to.name: py-geopmpy

dependent_to.description:
A collection of tools for representing and anlyzing neuroscientific
data.
dependent_to.name: py-neurotools

dependent_to.description:
This repository contains a Python package named PostCactus for
postprocessing data from numerical simulations performed with the
Einstein Toolkit.
dependent_to.name: py-postcactus

dependent_to.description:
SfePy (https://sfepy.org/) is a software for solving systems of coupled
partial differential equations (PDEs) by the finite element method in
1D, 2D and 3D. It can be viewed both as black-box PDE solver, and as a
Python package which can be used for building custom applications.
dependent_to.name: py-sfepy

description:
PyTables is a package for managing hierarchical datasets and designed to
efficiently and easily cope with extremely large amounts of data.
name: py-tables

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
